definition: public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Palm Basic is a utility written for the Palm series of handheld devices.
sentences.chinese: 基本的棕櫚是爲手扶的設備棕櫚系列寫的公共事業。

sentences.english: Public works, digging ditches, war has the same effect.
sentences.chinese: 公共事業，開河挖溝，發動戰爭都有同樣的效果。

sentences.english: Currently, however, only small number of utilities have partnered directly with Google.
sentences.chinese: 然而，目前只有少數的公共事業設備直接與谷歌合作。

sentences.english: Make innovation a common cause, for the greater good of all.
sentences.chinese: 要讓創新成爲一種爲更大的整體造福的公共事業。

sentences.english: These companies aren't sexy, but they are steady.
sentences.chinese: 公共事業公司並不誘人，但他們足夠穩重。

sentences.english: What the forest-products companies did impinged on the utilities.
sentences.chinese: 林業產品公司的做法給公共事業帶來了很大影響。

sentences.english: Works Progress Administration worker in a Depression-era photo.
sentences.chinese: 經濟大蕭條時期，一位公共事業振興署的工人。

sentences.english: But the alternative is to become low-margin utilities.
sentences.chinese: 但另一條出路卻是成爲微利的公共事業公司。

sentences.english: Water Submetering is a very widely accepted form of utility cost recovery.
sentences.chinese: 分水錶是一種廣泛接受的公共事業成本回收設備。

sentences.english: This publisher sends kilo-watt usage information to your utility company.
sentences.chinese: 該發佈服務器將千瓦使用信息發送到公共事業公司。

definition: family members of nationals residing abroad
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
